sma correlation matrix

Source: R/sma_cor.R
sma_cor.Rd

sma_cor calculate sma correlation matrix for each complete pairs.

sma_cor(mat)

Arguments

mat

a dataframe, include numeric columns for correlation

Value

a list of three elements: 1. `r.mat`r matrix, 2.`p.mat` p-value matrix and 3 `s.mat` slope matrix.

Author

Tien-Cheng Wang

Examples

#Define example dataset
sma_cor(mtcars[,1:7])

#> [[1]]
